description: MainActivity.kt is a Kotlin source file for an Android app that uses Jetpack Compose and Navigation. It defines the main activity class, composable functions for UI layout, navigation setup, overlay dialogs, and placeholder screens for a mobile game app.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity hosting the Compose content; uses enableEdgeToEdge for edge-to-edge display and sets the app's UI theme.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Overrides the activity's onCreate method; sets up the Compose UI, applies theme, and calls enableEdgeToEdge.

methods.name: AppRoot
methods.description: Top-level composable function that initializes the app's root content, including navigation and overlay states.

methods.name: RootContent
methods.description: Sets up navigation controller, manages overlay visibility states, and composes the main UI scaffold with top bar and overlays.

methods.name: SimpleTopBar
methods.description: Builds the top bar with title and action icons for language, pause, and settings.

methods.name: GameNavHost
methods.description: Defines the navigation graph with routes for main menu, game, achievements, and settings screens.

methods.name: SimpleOverlayContainer
methods.description: Creates a fullscreen dismissible overlay with semi-transparent background, used for pause, settings, and language dialogs.

methods.name: PauseOverlay
methods.description: Overlay shown when game is paused, offering Resume, Restart Level, Quit to Menu options.

methods.name: SettingsOverlay
methods.description: Overlay for game settings, displaying options like Sound, Music, Haptics, with a Close button.

methods.name: LanguageOverlay
methods.description: Overlay for language selection, offering language options with Done button.

methods.name: MainMenuScreen
methods.description: Initial screen with buttons to start game, view achievements, or access settings.

methods.name: GameScreen
methods.description: Main game interface placeholder with buttons to pause, change settings, or language.

methods.name: AchievementsScreen
methods.description: Screen showing achievements with a back button.
